mapper.select: SELECT A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.VACATION_ID FROM VACATION_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.VACATION_ID FROM VACATION_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } ORDER BY A.VACATION_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM VACATION_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId }
